modShortDescription: Why can we carry thousands of stones, but not thousand pieces of ammo? With this 7 Days to Die mod all stackable items and blocks are now at max.
modDescription:
Since balancing is hard to do and explain, like: Why can we carry thousands of stones, but not thousand pieces of [ammo](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-ammo/)? Just an example. With this 7 Days to Die mod all [stack](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-stack-size/)able items and blocks are now at max (6000 & 30000).

**Changelog**  
\*30K stack size version added.

[Download](https://www.mediafire.com/file/jectutg46hoezi8/Claymore_6K_Stack_Sizes.zip) 6k Stack Size  
[Download](https://www.mediafire.com/file/rmrayykjt5i2ytz/Claymore_30K_Stack_Sizes.zip) 30k Stack Size

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/15031-claymores-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Claymore](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/claymore/)
